article_title: New Study Provides Good News For Intuitive Surgical

article_metadata.description: This is a significant development for Intuitive Surgical because its da Vinci system received a lot of negative publicity last year from research reports which questioned its benefits and cost effectiveness, especially in hysterectomy procedures. As a result of the negative sentiment, da Vinci unit sales declined by more than 11% year-over-year to 546 systems in 2013.
article_metadata.author: Great Speculations
